strings.Value: "Who are you?"
"If I oppose Irovetti, will you support me?"
"I have to go."
[Attack] "You are Irovetti's servant, and that makes you my enemy!"
"How fares things in the city?"
"Goodbye."
"How is Baron Drelev feeling?"
"There you are. Well, what kind of performance are we to expect today? The capitulation of {mf|King|Queen} {Name} in face of the luminous Irovetti? Or... Something else?"
"I am Drey Yarnes, High Priest of {g|Calistria}Calistria{/g}, the patron of this city. I also command the temple guard."

"Why? Irovetti prays to {g|Calistria}Calistria{/g} himself, and donates generously to the temple. With him in charge, the city has become much more cheerful than it used to be. Why would I wish to see him deposed?"
"No, that's no reason to rebel. Think about it — why should I incite a riot?"
"The {g|Calistria}Savored Sting{/g} allows much, but what he's doing is unacceptable. I'm ashamed of accepting money tainted by his dirty crimes. I shall wash my hands in his blood!"
"I'm afraid you have nothing to offer me, Your Highness. If you oppose Irovetti, I will protect him. Now you'd better leave — there are spies everywhere."
"Go now, and carry out your plan. We shouldn't be seen together — there are spies everywhere!"
"Go, Your Highness. Today, the fates of many hang in the balance."
"Don't say another word. There are spies everywhere. Your fate awaits you on the palace steps. — Go now and face it!"
"Hello, Your Highness. May the goddess smile upon you."
"Not much has changed for the temple. Whoever may rule {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}, the city has but one divine patron — and everyone seeks her grace!"
"May your journey be safe!"

"Who? Oh, that {d|Drelev}poor fellow{/d} who thought he was dead? Luckily, his insanity was easily cured. The baron quickly recovered, and his strength was so well restored that he even charmed one of the temple priests. They got married and left together — for Daggermark, I believe."
